title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When I select the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu of a field in TH, nothing happens.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' action should add the Javadoc for the selected field.
SR:
1. Open the TH.
2. Right-click on a field.
3. Select the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu.
4. Verify that the Javadoc for the selected field is added.
